definition: air plant (Bryophyllum pinnatum)/to put down roots
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: Will the new arrivals strike roots here?
sentences.chinese: 新来的移民是否会落地生根？

sentences.english: Love is a see born, take root in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 爱，是一见而生，在心中落地生根。

sentences.english: Guilt crawled into me, Cause I've plan to stay here for good.
sentences.chinese: 我听了很惭愧，因为我本是打算在此落地生根的。
